Reset to default clustering methods

reset_clustering_methods.Rd

Reset to default clustering methods

reset_clustering_methods()

Details

The default methods are:

kmeans

see cluster_by_kmeans.

dynamicTreeCut

see cluster_by_dynamicTreeCut.

mclust

see cluster_by_mclust.

apcluster

see cluster_by_apcluster.

hdbscan

see cluster_by_hdbscan.

fast_greedy

see cluster_by_igraph.

leading_eigen

see cluster_by_igraph.

louvain

see cluster_by_igraph.

walktrap

see cluster_by_igraph.

MCL

see cluster_by_MCL.

binary_cut

see binary_cut.

Value

No value is returned.

Examples

all_clustering_methods()

#>  [1] "binary_cut"     "kmeans"         "dynamicTreeCut" "mclust"        
#>  [5] "apcluster"      "hdbscan"        "fast_greedy"    "leading_eigen" 
#>  [9] "louvain"        "walktrap"       "MCL"           
remove_clustering_methods(c("kmeans", "mclust"))
all_clustering_methods()

#> [1] "binary_cut"     "dynamicTreeCut" "apcluster"      "hdbscan"       
#> [5] "fast_greedy"    "leading_eigen"  "louvain"        "walktrap"      
#> [9] "MCL"           
reset_clustering_methods()
all_clustering_methods()

#>  [1] "kmeans"         "dynamicTreeCut" "mclust"         "apcluster"     
#>  [5] "hdbscan"        "fast_greedy"    "leading_eigen"  "louvain"       
#>  [9] "walktrap"       "MCL"            "binary_cut"
